title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to press the 'finish' button in the JAR packager, the application displays an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'. This issue occurs consistently and prevents the successful creation of the JAR file.
OB: When pressing the 'finish' button in the JAR packager, the application displays an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'
EB: After pressing the 'finish' button in the JAR packager, the application should successfully create the JAR file without any error messages.
SR:
This issue can be reproduced by performing the following steps:
1. Open the JAR packager in the application.
2. Add some files to the JAR packager.
3. Press the 'finish' button.
4. Observe the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
